case.title: generous and charming... - 35 (Central London)
case.text:
looking to set up drinks tonight with a cute female (with the option of dinner - my treat - if we get on). I'm a charming and witty Irish guy, tall and in good shape, well groomed, avid Daily Mail reader (it's a proper paper, you know), not attached (as of recently) and easy to hang out with. City lawyer, live near Primrose Hill.
I'm neither a spammer nor a bot, photo is available for genuine replies.
